Text: No audio for the last 2 min. Yer slippin Yiffy.
True, no audio for the last three minutes, and there is almost no credit time, so those three minutes are wasted...

Yep. the audio goes out the last two minutes. I'm glad I'm not the only one. I just hope there wasn't a gun shot at the end. I have to download another version with the missing audio just to find out. Sorry, if my comment is a spoiler, but you don't know if you can't hear it. Yer Slippin' YIFY. But, still, you're the best.
